lead_paragraph: Real Madrid and their neighbours Atletico Madrid have had their bans on signing new players for the next two transfer windows suspended pending the outcome of appeals to FIFA, the clubs said in separate statements on Friday.

headline.print_headline: Real and Atletico Transfer Bans Suspended Pending Appeals
headline.main: Real and Atletico Transfer Bans Suspended Pending Appeals

snippet: Real Madrid and their neighbours Atletico Madrid have had their bans on signing new players for the next two transfer windows suspended pending the outcome of appeals to FIFA, the clubs said in separate statements on Friday....
